articles.description: ‘This strain is super powerful and contagious so I do hope that people take extra care in the coming weeks,’ she said
articles.content:
Jessie Caves two-month-old baby Tenn has been admitted to hospital after testing positive for coronavirus.

articles.title: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry’s U-turn after insisting ‘we are NOT starting a foundation’ - Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE and Prince Harry have launched their new Archewell Foundation, despite insisting they would not start a foundation.
